thread.title_full: Come to the Free Writing and Study Skills Workshops at the LAVC Academic Resource Center ... - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Come to the Free Writing and Study Skills Workshops at the LAVC Academic Resource Center ...
text: ( Source : Los Angeles Valley College ) LAVC to offer free workshops on 'Adjectives vs. Adverbs Subject /Verb Agreements' on October 5 at 1 p.m., ' Verbs : Types of Verbs/Auxilary/ Tenses ' on October 6 at 10 a.m. and 'Post-Test/ Paper Reflection '
